Verses: 1 ippadiyirukka, Niyaayappiramaanamaanadhu Varappogira Nanmaigalin Porulaayiraamal, Avaigalin Nizhalaaimaaththiram Irukkirapadiyaal, Varushandhorum Idaividaamal Seluththappattuvarugira Orevidhamaana Baligalinaale Avaigalai Seluththa Varugiravargalai Orukkaalum Pooranappaduththamaattaadhu.

2 pooranappaduththumaanaal, Aaraadhanai Seygiravargal Orudharam Suththamaakkappattapinbu, Innum Paavangalundendru Unarththum Manasaatchi Avargalukku Illaadhiruppadhinaal, Andhabaligalai Seluththugiradhu Niruththappadumallavaa?
3 appadi Niruththappadaadhapadiyaal, Paavangal Undendru Avaigalinaale Varushandhorum Ninaivukoorudhal Undaayirukkiradhu.
4 allaamalum, Kaalai Vellaattukkadaa Ivaigaludaiya Raththam Paavangalai Nivirththiseyyamaattaadhe.
5 aagaiyaal Avar Ulagaththil Piravesikkumpodhu: Baliyaiyum Kaanikkaiyaiyum Neer Virumbavillai, Oru Sareeraththai Enakku Aayaththampannineer;
6 sarvaanga Thaganabaligalum, Paavanivaarana Baligalum Umakku Piriyamaanadhalla Endreer.
7 appozhudhu Naan: Dhevane, Ummudaiya Siththaththinpadi Seyya, Idho, Varugiren, Pusthagachsurulil Ennaikkuriththu Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu Endru Sonnen Endraar.

8 niyaayappiramaanaththinpadi Seluththappattuvarugira Baligalaikkuriththu Mersolliyapadi: Baliyaiyum, Kaanikkaiyaiyum, Sarvaanga Thaganabaligalaiyum, Paavanivaaranabaligalaiyum Neer Virumbavillai, Avaigal Umakku Piriyamaanadhalla Endru Sonnapinbu:
9 dhevane, Ummudaiya Siththaththinpadi Seyya, Idho, Varugiren Endru Irandaavadhai Nilainiruththuvadharku Mudhalaavadhai Neekkippodugiraar.
10 yesukiristhuvinudaiya Sareeram Oredharam Baliyidappattadhinaale, Andha Siththaththinpadi Naam Parisuththamaakkappattirukkirom.
11 andriyum, Endha Aasaariyanum Naadorum Aaraadhanai Seygiravanaayum, Paavangalai Orukkaalum Nivirththiseyyakkoodaatha Orevidha Baligalai Anegandharam Seluththivarugiravanaayum Nirpaan.
12 ivaro, Paavangalukkaaga Ore Baliyai Seluththi, Endrendraikkum Dhevanudaiya Valadhupaarisaththil Utkaarndhu,
13 ini Thammudaiya Saththurukkalaith Thamadhu Paadhapadiyaakkippodumvaraikkum Kaaththukkondirukkiraar.
14 enenil Parisuththamaakkappadugiravargalai Ore Baliyinaale Ivar Endrendraikkum Pooranappaduththiyirukkiraar.
15 idhaikkuriththu Parisuththa Aaviyaanavarum Namakku Saatchisollugiraar; Eppadiyenil:

16 andha Naatkalukkuppinbu Naan Avargalode Pannum Udanpadikkaiyaavadhu: Naan Ennudaiya Piramaanangalai Avargaludaiya Irudhayangalil Vaiththu, Avaigalai Avargaludaiya Manadhil Ezhudhuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraarenpadhai Uraiththapinbu,
17 avargaludaiya Paavangalaiyum Avargaludaiya Akkiramangalaiyum Naan Ini Ninaippadhillai Enbadhai Sollugiraar.
18 ivaigal Mannikkappattadhundaanaal, Ini Paavaththinimiththam Bali Seluththappaduvadhillaiye.
19 aagaiyaal, Sagodharare, Naam Parisuththa Sthalaththil Piravesippadharku Yesuvaanavar Thamadhu Maamsamaagiya Thiraiyin Vazhiyaai Pudhidhum Jeevanumaana Maarkkaththai Namakku Undupanninapadiyaal,
20 andha Maarkkaththinvazhiyaai Piravesippadharku Avarudaiya Raththaththinaale Namakku Dhairiyam Undaayirukkirapadiyinaalum,
21 dhevanudaiya Veettinmel Adhigaariyaana Mahaa Aasaariyar Namakku Oruvar Irukkirapadiyinaalum,

22 thurmanasaatchi Neengath Thelikkappatta Irudhayamullavargalaayum, Suththa Jalaththaal Kazhuvappatta Sareeramullavargalaayum, Unmaiyulla Irudhayaththodum Visuvaasaththin Poorana Nichchayaththodum Serakkadavom.
23 allaamalum, Nammudaiya Nambikkaiyai Arikkaiyidugiradhil Asaivillaamal Urudhiyaayirukkakkadavom; Vaakkuththaththampanninavar Unmaiyullavaraayirukkiraare.
24 melum, Anbukkum Narkiriyaigalukkum Naam Evappadumpadi Oruvaraiyoruvar Gavaniththu;

25 sabai Koodivarudhalai Silar Vittuvidugiradhupola Naamum Vittuvidaamal, Oruvarukkoruvar Buththisollakkadavom; Naalaanadhu Sameebiththuvarugiradhai Evvalavaai Paarkkireergalo Avvalavaai Buththisollavendum.
26 saththiyaththai Ariyum Arivai Adaindhapinbu Naam Manappoorvamaai Paavanseygiravargalaayirundhaal, Paavangalinimiththam Seluththaththakka Verorubali Iniyiraamal,
27 niyaayaththeerppu Varumendru Bayaththode Edhirpaarkkudhalum, Virodhigalai Patchikkum Kobaakkinaiyume Irukkum.
28  Moseyinudaiya Piramaanaththai Thallugiravan Irakkamperaamal Irandumoondru Saatchigalin Vaakkinaale Saagiraane;

29 dhevanudaiya Kumaaranai Kaalinkeezh Midhiththu, Thannai Parisuththanseydha Udanpadikkaiyin Raththaththai Asuththamendrenni, Kirubaiyin Aaviyai Nindhikkiravan Evvalavu Kodidhaana Aakkinaikku Paaththiravaanaayiruppaanenpadhai Yosiththuppaarungal.
30 pazhivaangudhal Enakkuriyadhu, Naane Padhirseyven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endrum, Karththar Thammudaiya Janangalai Niyaayantheerppaarendrum Sonnavar Innaarendru Arivom.
31 jeevanulla Dhevanudaiya Kaigalile Vizhugiradhu Bayangaramaayirukkume.
32 mundhina Naatkalai Ninaiththukkollungal; Neengal Piragaasamaakkappattirundha Andha Naatkalil Ubaththiravangalaagiya Migundha Poraattaththai Sagiththeergale.
33 nindhaigalaalum Ubaththiravangalaalum Neengal Vedikkaiyaakkappattadhumallaamal, Appadi Nadaththappattavargalukku Pangaaligalumaaneergal.

34 naan Kattappattirukkaiyil Neengal Ennaikkuriththu Paridhabiththadhumandri, Paralogaththil Adhiga Menmaiyum Nilaiyulladhumaana Sudhandharam Ungalukku Undendru Arindhu, Ungal Aasthigalaiyum Sandhoshamaai Kollaiyidakkoduththeergal.
35 aagaiyaal, Migundha Balanukkedhuvaana Ungal Dhairiyaththai Vittuvidaadhirungal.
36 neengal Dhevanudaiya Siththaththinpadi Seydhu, Vaakkuththaththampannappattadhai Perumpadikku Porumai Ungalukku Vendiyadhaayirukkiradhu.
37 varugiravar Innung Konjakkaalaththil Varuvaar, Thaamadhampannaar.
38 visuvaasaththinaale Needhimaan Pizhaippaan, Pinvaangippovaanaanaal Avanmel En Aaththumaa Piriyamaayiraadhu Engiraar.
39 naamo Kettuppoga Pinvaangugiravargalaayiraamal, Aaththumaa Eedera Visuvaasikkiravargalaayirukkirom.
